## ShaderHelper.getAPDensity() method

Gets the uniform variable of type float which holds the aerial perspective density

**Signature:**

```typescript
static getAPDensity(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope): PBShaderExp;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | [PBInsideFunctionScope](doc/markdown/./device.pbinsidefunctionscope.md) | Current shader scope |

**Returns:**

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)

aerial perspective density
